requirement_summary: Placing on the market and putting into service
description: Documentation demonstrating that in vitro diagnostic medical devices placed on the market or put into service comply with IVDR requirements, including evidence of conformity assessment completion and CE marking
auditor_questions: Show me evidence that this IVD device complies with all applicable IVDR requirements
How do you verify conformity assessment is completed before placing an IVD on the market?
What controls prevent non-compliant IVDs from being released to market?
How do you manage the transition of devices from the IVDD to the IVDR framework?

maturity_levels.basic: Compliance checklist for market placement, CE marking process documented
maturity_levels.intermediate: Automated compliance verification workflow, regulatory tracking system
maturity_levels.advanced: Integrated product lifecycle compliance management, real-time regulatory intelligence

description: Comprehensive quality management system documentation for IVD manufacturers covering design controls, performance evaluation, risk management, post-market surveillance, and compliance with general safety and performance requirements
auditor_questions: Show me your quality management system documentation for IVD devices
How does your QMS address the specific requirements for IVD performance evaluation?
What risk management processes are integrated into your IVD development lifecycle?
How do you handle non-conformities and corrective actions for IVD devices?

maturity_levels.basic: QMS documentation exists covering core IVDR requirements, ISO 13485 aligned
maturity_levels.intermediate: Integrated QMS with automated CAPA tracking, performance evaluation procedures, management reviews
maturity_levels.advanced: Digital QMS with real-time compliance monitoring, AI-assisted quality analytics, continuous improvement

description: Procedure for IVD distributors to verify that devices bear CE marking, EU declaration of conformity has been drawn up, required labelling is present, and storage and transport conditions are maintained
auditor_questions: How do you verify IVD devices comply with IVDR requirements before distribution?
What checks do you perform on CE marking and labelling compliance?
How do you ensure proper storage conditions including temperature requirements?
What is your process when you identify a potentially non-compliant IVD device?

maturity_levels.basic: Basic verification checklist for incoming IVD devices
maturity_levels.intermediate: Structured incoming inspection, temperature monitoring, traceability records
maturity_levels.advanced: Automated compliance verification, IoT-based condition monitoring, real-time supply chain visibility

requirement_summary: EU declaration of conformity for IVDs
description: EU declaration of conformity for IVD devices containing device identification, manufacturer details, risk class, conformity assessment procedure followed, applicable common specifications and standards, and signed declaration
auditor_questions: Show me the EU declaration of conformity for this IVD device
Does the declaration include all information required under Annex IV?
How do you maintain the declaration when applicable standards or common specifications change?
How do you manage declarations across your IVD device portfolio?

maturity_levels.basic: Declaration exists with all mandatory information for each IVD device
maturity_levels.intermediate: Centralised declaration management, version control, regular review cycle
maturity_levels.advanced: Automated declaration generation, real-time compliance tracking, integrated with regulatory database

requirement_summary: Unique Device Identification system for IVDs
description: Documentation of UDI system implementation for IVD devices including UDI-DI and UDI-PI assignment, carrier placement on labels, and data submission to the UDI database for all IVD risk classes
retention_period: Duration of device market availability + 10 years
auditor_questions: Show me your UDI assignment and management process for IVD devices
How do you ensure UDI carriers are properly placed on IVD labels and packaging?
How do you handle UDI requirements for devices with multiple components?
How do you submit and maintain UDI data in the EUDAMED database?

maturity_levels.basic: UDI assigned to all IVD devices, basic data submitted to UDI database
maturity_levels.intermediate: Automated UDI management, barcode verification at packaging, supply chain UDI tracking
maturity_levels.advanced: Full UDI traceability from manufacturing to laboratory, EUDAMED integration, real-time tracking

artifact_name: IVD Manufacturer and Device Registration Records
description: Records of IVD manufacturer registration and device registration including single registration number, device identification for all IVD classes, and verification of complete registration status
auditor_questions: Show me your manufacturer registration and single registration number for IVD devices
Are all marketed IVD devices properly registered?
How do you maintain registration when your IVD portfolio changes?
What process ensures timely registration of new IVD devices before market placement?

maturity_levels.basic: Manufacturer registered, core IVD devices registered in system
maturity_levels.intermediate: Complete IVD portfolio registration, regular verification, change management process
maturity_levels.advanced: Automated registration management, real-time status monitoring, cross-reference validation

description: Certificate and documentation from the conformity assessment process for IVD devices including the assessment route selected based on device risk class (A, B, C, D), notified body assessment results, and performance evaluation review
auditor_questions: Show me the conformity assessment certificate for this IVD device
What conformity assessment route was selected based on the device risk class?
How did the notified body assess your performance evaluation data?
What common specifications were applied during the assessment?

maturity_levels.basic: Appropriate conformity assessment route selected, certificate obtained
maturity_levels.intermediate: Proactive notified body engagement, comprehensive technical documentation
maturity_levels.advanced: Streamlined assessment process, pre-submission reviews, continuous compliance validation

artifact_name: IVD Post-Market Surveillance Plan and Report
description: Post-market surveillance plan and periodic safety update report for IVD devices documenting systematic data collection on device performance, complaint analysis, performance data trending, and risk-benefit updates

How do you monitor the performance of your IVD devices in real-world use?
